stories.text:
I'm kinda looking for a game I could play causally on the phone. Free or paid. Ideally no in-app purchases. Ideally I'd play a few minutes and whenever I feel like it. No long sessions required. Puzzle-y? With stages, or open-ended?

Let's hear what (or if) the HN crowd plays!
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you play any mobile games?
Valve's Upcoming Steam Deck Dev Day Will Explore AMD's Van Gogh APU
What’s something you wish you’d known before starting your startup?
AlphaFold: Generate protein fold predictions in browser

stories.text:
Hi guys,

The last questions on this topic that I could find were from nine and eleven years ago. A long time.

http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=1564651 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3843448

1) What are some of your favorite recently launched product/service videos?

2) If you are offering advice to startups which are trying to create their own in-house low-cost videos, what tips would you offer ( concerning software, story-boarding, pure screen-casts etc)?

3) If you are advising startups with a $1-$4k budget, how would you outsource the video production?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your favorite startup demo videos?
Taste of Flutter DevOps. Use Derry to Auomate
